Job Description: Position Summary     As part of our expanding presence in the IoT space, we looking for a Senior Python Developer to help us build functional and efficient serverside and cloud-based applications in our AWS environment.     Responsibilities     Develop well-structured and documented source code     Provide documentation as needed     Perform software deployment and packaging     Help design and implement functional requirements     Follow formal processes like Scrum and issue tracking/updating in support of the product development process.     Requirements     Solid experience as Python 3 Developer     MUST be comfortable using AWS services     Experience in the AWS Python frameworks     Experience building/support APIs     Understanding of cloud file systems, databases and SQL     You must be comfortable on Linux/UNIX systems (RHEL/CentOS, Ubuntu)     Scripting experience using BASH and/or Python     Understanding of internet standards, web technologies, and enterprise-level systems     Web technologies including ReST, XML/JSON, client/server architecture, web architecture     Technical Skills     Python 3 (of course)     PDatabases: SQL working knowledge (MySQL/Oracle would nice), AWS DynamoDB     Cloud Technologies: working knowledge of AWS services, ideally Lambda, Cognito, DynamoDB, S3, Kinesis, SQS/SNS, IoT, Serverless framework, and othersg     Comfortable with modern software development tools/environments:  version control tools, git github  project management systems, ideally Jira  documentation in markdown
